_meta.source: Researched from Dubai Tourism, cruise port guides, and local sources

bbox_hint.note: Covers port, Downtown Dubai, Marina, Palm Jumeirah

transit_routes.name: Taxi to Downtown Dubai
transit_routes.note: Uber and Careem also available. Traffic can add time.

transit_routes.name: Taxi to Dubai Marina
transit_routes.note: Beach and nightlife area. Palm Jumeirah nearby.

transit_routes.name: Walk to Old Dubai
transit_routes.note: Creek and souks walkable from port. Take abra boat across.

featured_experiences.name: Burj Khalifa & Dubai Mall
featured_experiences.note: Book At the Top tickets in advance. Combine with fountain show at dusk.

featured_experiences.name: Old Dubai Heritage Walk
featured_experiences.note: Authentic Dubai before the skyscrapers. Best in morning.

featured_experiences.name: Palm Jumeirah & Beach Day
featured_experiences.note: Day passes available at beach clubs. Monorail from Gateway station.
